lines.text:
[showing Adam a revolver]
Cool huh? We could blow someone away with this thing
A lot of death in this house.
[last lines]
Hey Adam I've got a new game for us to play but you need a stick.
[Adam ignores him]
Come on Adam get a stick
[no response]
I'm King Arthur and this is excaliber on guard
[Adam still isn't listening]
Come on Adam get a stick
[Adam finally swings round glaring at Henry]
[Holding a gun shaped stick on Henry]
[last lines with a cold snear]
Bang your dead!

[Upon catching sight of the photographs that show him shooting Manny]
Well I guess there's no point in keeping up pre-tenses
Who are you?
I'm the boy's father
Garry Madison? But they said you died?
Surprise

[Indicating to Adam]
He's doing great isn't he?
You Killed Manny

[Defensivley]
He was bothering my kid
And Margaret... and Daddy?
You were always what I pictured as a mother who could care for my son... but mothers are a dime a dozen... I know I had ten growing up in those damed foster homes.
If this continues sir... you won't have any family left
I never feel right, till I have all the answers
Hi honey I'm home.
You've been living here all along?
Your dumb waiter served many purposes.
Put the gun down, son.
